titles.title: Be Ye Then Holy (familiar easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be ye than holy So the Master wills He speaketh let us hear His gracious voice Us with His holy life He daily fills So in that holiness Let us rejoice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}These bodies then are His He doth them use So let Him use them As it seemeth good These members all are His Shall we abuse For earthly vileness Vessels cleansed with blood{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}These eyes are His - these ears These lips - this tougue They are all His far more Than they are ours Shall we pollute them with Earth's sin and wrong Or waste in vain delights These God-given powers{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}These hands are His Shall they not do His work These feet are His Let them His errands run Shall in this frame The foe of goodness lurk Shall he usurp The consecrated throne{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Upon His holy throne These members yet Shall all be seated In that day when He The head of the great unity Shall sit With them to share One common royalty{/lang-eng}
